about_the_game:
Dive into the post-apocalyptic realm of 'Never Be Alone,' an expansive open-world game designed for both solo and multiplayer experiences. In this zombie survival adventure, you can seamlessly team up with friends or brave the dangers alone. Beyond the relentless undead, you'll face ruthless bandits and the relentless challenges of hunger, thirst, and treacherous radioactive zones. Survive against all odds, where the environment is as deadly as the creatures that inhabit it.

Dynamic Gameplay Features:


First & Third Person View: Experience the apocalypse through your preferred perspective. Whether you want the immersion of first-person or the awareness of third-person, switch seamlessly to suit your playstyle.

Advanced Survival Systems:

Farming System: Cultivate your own crops to sustain your group’s needs.
Generator System: Keep the lights on and your equipment powered with a robust generator system, vital for survival in the darkest times.

Rich Resource Gathering:

Scavenge and Salvage: Delve into the remnants of civilization to loot broken cars and abandoned buildings for crucial supplies.
Natural Resources: Gather essential materials like wood, stone, and metal from the environment, necessary for crafting and building.
Fishing: Relax with a fishing rod to catch food, providing a peaceful contrast to the post-apocalyptic tension.
Bow and Arrow: Employ stealth and skill with the bow to dispatch threats quietly and efficiently.

Crafting and Repair:

Workbench Crafting: Use collected materials to craft a variety of items and tools at your workbench, from defensive structures to utilities.
Repair Bench: Maintain and repair your weapons and gear at the repair bench, ensuring you're always ready for whatever challenges lie ahead.

Community and Trade:

Shops: Scour different shops in the safe zones for supplies, weapons, and unique items.
Missions & Side Quests: Engage in a variety of missions and side quests that will challenge your skills and reward you handsomely.
Safe Zones: Find sanctuary in designated Safe Zones where you can interact with other players peacefully, trade goods, plan your next move, and stay clear from both undead and human threats.

Face the Horde: A Closer Look at the Zombie Types


"Never Be Alone" elevates the undead threat with a diverse array of zombie types, each requiring unique strategies to defeat. Understanding your enemy is key to survival. Here's what you'll face in the desolate landscapes of our open-world:

Walker: The common threat. These slow-moving zombies aren't much of a challenge individually but can quickly become overwhelming in numbers.
Runner: Quicker than the Walker, this fast-paced zombie will test your stamina. Running may save you for a moment, but they'll keep up the chase.
Sprinter: The pinnacle of undead agility. If a Sprinter spots you, don't even think about running; it's futile. Your best chance is to stand your ground and fight.
Bloater: Approach with caution. This medium-speed menace will explode upon death, releasing a toxic cloud that can be lethal. Long-range weapons are advised, as melee attacks are a death wish.
Brute: The ultimate behemoth. Encountering a Brute means it's time to either bring out the big guns or get out of the way. Exceptionally dangerous at close range, a Brute can demolish anything in its path.

Engage and Build:



Base Building: Fortify your territory by constructing impenetrable bases. Customize your fortress to reflect your survival style.
Danger Zones: Dare to explore radioactive zones, but beware—without the proper gas mask, these areas spell instant doom.
Social Survival: Whether warding off bandits or outsmarting the undead, survival is better with friends. Easy connectivity makes teaming up a breeze.

Rich Customization and More:



Personalize Your Survivor: Customize your survivor with a selection of character meshes and hairstyles. While the options are straightforward, they allow you to create a character that fits your style within the game's post-apocalyptic world.
Diverse Arsenal: Equip yourself for survival with a broad range of weaponry options. Whether you prefer the silent precision of bows and melee weapons or the robust power of firearms, you'll find tools that suit your tactical needs. And when you need a moment's respite from the ongoing chaos, enjoy a peaceful fishing break by the waterside.

Demo Features:



Mission-Driven Adventures: Get a taste of the apocalypse with several missions designed to introduce you to the world of "Never Be Alone."
Prepare to navigate a world where danger lurks around every corner and teamwork is the key to survival. Are you ready to face the undead and never be alone?
